section.heading: Grounds.
section.text: The Mayor may commence a proceeding under § 29-106.02 to dissolve a domestic filing entity administratively if the entity does not:

para.text: Pay any fee or penalty required to be paid to the Mayor not later than 5 months after it is due;
Deliver a biennial report to the Mayor not later than 5 months after it is due; or
Have a registered agent in the District for 60 days.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 29-106.02, § 29-610.01, and § 29-1208.01.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 deleted “tax”’ following “fee” in (a); and substituted “5 months” for “6 months” in (b).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
